## IJEvent.on() method

绑定事件到html对象

**Signature:**

```typescript
on(name: string | Array`<string>`, fun: EventListenerOrEventListenerObject, opt?: boolean | AddEventListenerOptions): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string \| Array&lt;string&gt; | 事件名称 |
|  fun | EventListenerOrEventListenerObject | 事件委托 |
|  opt | boolean \| AddEventListenerOptions | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

any

返回当前绑定
